name: World Above: Merge games
description:
Enter the world of dragons, the world of magic puzzles... the World Above!
Mystical creatures and mythical treasures are waiting for you in a fantastic kingdom of sky islands, where dragons ruue! A unique mix of Viking myths and modern fantasy!
Watch your little dragon hatch, grow and become stronger as you match tiles and solve puzzles!
Match and merge! Build and combine! The only limit is your imagination - it's a magical realm of fantasy... a dragons world!
Collect treasures, amass coins, explore the land... but don't forget to rest in a cozy camp! Then come back to uncover more secrets! There's always one more puzzle to find!
How to make your dragon stronger? Merge eggs to breed mighty creatures! Match 3 is the path to victory! And there are some secret things to learn...
Build you sky empire in the World Above!
